name: Koreneef Public Affairs Limited
legal: UK Private Limited Company (under Companies Act 2006
membership: Netherlands Association for Public Affairs professionals (Beroepsvereniging voor Public Affairs - BVPA)
goal: Koreneef Public Affairs (K-PA) offers an EU political and stakeholder consultancy service. Working with clients, K-PA identifies business opportunities and challenges, assisting clients to plan their strategy and the supporting engagement to address issues in good time. K-PA helps to ensure that appropriate relationships with stakeholders are built and maintained.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Environment; Chemicals; Justice and Home Affairs; Food; Counter-terrorism; Enterprise and Industry; Internal Market; Energy and Transport; External relations; Foreign and Security Policy.
